programme.title: ABC News Mornings - Episode 72
programme.desc: When you need to know what's going on in the morning, turn to Dan Bourchier for up to the minute news and events as they unfold. Plus the latest in politics, business, sport with Catherine Murphy and weather with Nate Byrne.

programme.title: ABC News At Noon - Episode 72

programme.title: The Cook Up With Adam Liaw - Pasta With Punch

programme.desc: The campaign is underway and as political leaders cross the country chasing votes in key seats, Q+A is in Casula in the seat of Werriwa in southwest Sydney. Cost of living is a major issue in the outer urban mortgage belt.

programme.title: See What You Made Me Do - Episode 1
programme.desc: Not all abuse is violent, and where violence does exist, it has almost always been preceded by controlling behaviours now known as 'coercive control'. Jess Hill explains the psychology of coercive control.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Vietnam's Soil Saviours
programme.desc: With climate change pushing rice farmers to the brink in Vietnam's Mekong Delta, we meet two soil scientists who are using an innovative technology to help farmers adapt.

programme.title: Planet America - Episode 10
programme.desc: Trump's 'Liberation Day' global tariffs as Australian imports to the US hit with a 10% tariff. Chas and John are back to discuss Greenland, the Signal group chat discussing military plans, Trump teases a third term and more.

programme.title: Afternoon Briefing - Episode 54
programme.desc: A daily wrap of everything you need to know in politics, national and global affairs. Patricia Karvelas asks politicians the tough questions and talks to experts on issues driving the news cycle ahead of the May 3 Election.

programme.desc: News from where we live. ABC News Victoria brings you the day's top stories, exclusive investigations and original reporting on the issues that matter to you. Presented by Tamara Oudyn (Sun-Thu) and Iskhandar Razak (Fri-Sat).

programme.title: Saving Venice
programme.desc: Venice is under attack from climate change. Flooding is becoming more frequent. With each inundation of seawater, more salt impregnates the city's historic buildings. As it crystallises, it rips the bricks, mortar and stone to shreds. The city is crumbling. Venice's very existence is hanging in the balance. Can scientists and engineers find ways to protect this unique jewel of architecture, beauty and culture before it's too late?

programme.title: Joanna Lumley's Hidden Caribbean: Havana to Haiti 1
programme.desc: Before leaving Cuba, Joanna gets as close as possible to Guantanamo Bay, before taking a short boat trip to Haiti, a nation born from slave revolution with a strong tradition of voodoo.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? 1
programme.desc: Discover how engineers bent two Manhattan skyscrapers and then connected them with a sky bridge 700 feet in the air, and in Greece the 10,000 square foot canopy designed to withstand hurricane winds on a building engineered to survive earthquakes.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy go bowling - but it's hard work, especially when his fingers get stuck in a ball!

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah has created a comic starring Gumball as the heroic Laserheart. He embarks upon a vigilante quest for justice to rid Elmore of crime, but Gumball soon discovers that even a superhero is sometimes no match for a regular villain.

programme.title: Unikitty
programme.desc: After Richard puts on an amateur magic show, Dr. Fox becomes obsessed figuring out how his science-defying tricks are done.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quacker, Tuffy and others in the Dandy Do-Gooders club earn their badges with the help of their club leader, Jerry, who creates new ways of irritating Tom.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While on holiday, the Docs realise that Lamput is on the same train, but in First Class! They disguise themselves to try and get in...

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Hector hires The Looney Builders to build him a burger restaurant, but Daffy is so focused on beating his handheld game that he causes major setbacks.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Daffy ruins Porky’s shirt, and then he ruins Porky’s life. When Pilgrim Elmer celebrates the first Thanksgiving, Bugs is not very thankful.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: In a dark and cobwebby corner of his attic, Mr. Bean finds a treasure map. The hunt is on! But tricky clues lead Bean up the chimney, round the bend, down the garden path, up the blinking wall and nearly all the way to Australia.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: The final clash of the All-Star Battle is underway.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Grundy, a giant monster truck, causes chaos as he stomps around Gotham and creates a mess. He’s too powerful for the Batwheels to stop, but Buff finds a friendly solution to end the city shaking shenanigans.

programme.title: The Powerpuff Girls
programme.desc: When the beach is taken over by the most excellent Bro Sharks, will the Girls be gnarly enough to save the day?

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Clarence's first night home alone spirals out of control, forcing Clarence and his pals to wage war against their own home security measures.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Beast Boy gets a stack of cash from the Tooth Fairy. So, against Raven's advice, the other Titans start knocking out their own teeth to get some of that sweet Tooth Fairy money.

programme.title: Boy Girl Dog Cat Mouse Cheese
programme.desc: While watching a documentary on wolves, Boy teases Dog for being a softie.

programme.title: The Tom And Jerry Show
programme.desc: It’s summer and Spike’s the primary beneficiary of Rick’s daily grilling ritual; the pooch is tossed a nice juicy T-bone nightly. When Spike gets stuck trying to exit the doghouse, he realizes it’s time to back off the beef.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean discovers Declan giving Irma a lift in his swanky new SUV. Bean is unimpressed until Declan shows off all the car’s features. Undeterred Bean professes his car superior.

programme.title: Looney Tunes Cartoons
programme.desc: Bugs must outsmart a new technological foe.

programme.title: Tiny Toons Looniversity
programme.desc: Buster and Sweetie join the Tooney Ball team during Electives Week while Babs and Plucky tackle the basics in Anvils 101, leaving Hamton on a journey to fix his indecisiveness.

programme.title: The Amazing World Of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joe's mom paints pictures which predict the future.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: Multi goes up against Sigrid Nana-iro in the first battle of the title match.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: After reading a book about a mystical animal society in class, Clarence is inspired to round up local animals and recreate an animal world of his own, to cheer up his friend Percy.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin's wish comes true and he finally gets superpowers- but at what cost?

programme.title: Hero Inside
programme.desc: Nick and Mike try to uncover the true identity of a Reader who is using his Hero Book powers to take revenge on bullies at their high school. Meanwhile, Dirk O, angry at his defeat to Mike, encounters the enigmatic Krista...

programme.title: Ben 10
programme.desc: Ben, Gwen and Grandpa Max arrive in Bismarck, North Dakota for its annual celebration of bee pollination, bringing them face-to-face with Queen Bee and a bold new scheme, forcing Ben to conquer his new fear of bees!

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: All aboard! Finn and Jake discover a train where every car is a dungeon filled with a new foe for Finn to fight. Jake quickly gets bored and wants to leave, but Finn is having the BEST time and doesn't want to leave... ever!

programme.title: Steven Universe
programme.desc: Steven and Peridot attempt to catch an elusive, speedy, corrupted gem monster in the Beta Kindergarten.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: When Mordecai and Rigby order T-shirts for their non-existent band (Mordecai and the Rigbys), Margaret mistakes them for actual musicians.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: Gazpacho talks Mung and the gang into helping him deliver dangerous fruit.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: A tornado rips through Nowhere, destroying the farmhouse and turning Muriel into a little girl again--just 3-and-a-half years old. Courage must find a way to bring back his 'old' Muriel.

programme.title: Regular Show
programme.desc: Rigby steals a magic keyboard from a preoccupied sorcerer. When Mordecai and Rigby accidentally make a hole in the wall while wrestling a stuffed animal, they use the keyboard to make Pops and Benson give them raises to try to pay for it.

programme.title: Chowder
programme.desc: The gang's costumes accidentally shrink as they head out to Mr Fugu's fruit-themed party.

programme.title: Courage The Cowardly Dog
programme.desc: Muriel experiences amnesia after being struck on the head by a piece of the farmhouse roof. Courage summons help, which arrives in the form of a French con artist duck posing as a doctor.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: Unwilling to share the food both he and the Lemmings are wild about, Grizzy locks it up inside the ranger's brand new and apparently burglar-proof safe. He watches the Lemmings' vain attempts to open the safe with amusement, until he realizes that the string around his neck with the key is far from indestructible.

programme.title: Grizzy And The Lemmings
programme.desc: While looking for the TV remote-control device, Grizzy happens onto a box that can localize a bunch of keys thanks to its key ring, which is equipped with a tracker. Grizzy decides to stick the spy device under a jar of chocolate spread.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean takes free food samples from a food truck at a market and sells them to raise funds for a teapot.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk
programme.desc: When the town’s well runs dry, Hiccup and Toothless discover a group of baby Whispering Death dragons living in the tunnels underneath, planted there by Alvin.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Poppy signs the Trolls up for a game of Bergenball with the toughest Bergen team aroundSmidge and Guy Diamond face off in a competition for juice dominance.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and Scallop enlist Cruz’s help to perform a dance for Mom’s birthday. Though it’s hard at first, they learn to put their dolphin, unicorn, and narwhal powers together to create something special. / Kelp, Pixie, Ollie, and their friend Leroy try to help Juniper understand her angry feelings.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Scallop is afraid of her first “tuskist” appointment. Kelp helps her get through it with a song. / Fog rolls in, threatening Kelp’s first Three Moon Festival in Unicorn Land. Kelp and his friends use a combination of unicorn spark and the Kelp Way to create a new festival.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: It’s Pawston’s annual Take Your Kid to Work Day, and it’s Tag’s year to spend the day at the Doorbell Store with Paw. \ Sam Whippet challenges the Not Yet Cadets to complete an obstacle course in the woods.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: Scooch is bummed out because he’s missing his favorite holiday back in his old farm town, so Tag wants to cheer him up by rounding up some chickens and bringing Clucky Day to Pawston. \ When there’s a schedule mix-up and the Pawston Get Sox players think they have a day off, it’s up to Tag and Scooch to round up all five players in time for the fetch game, so that they don’t have to forfeit.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: When Mr. Tanaka adopts an unruly dog at Sam’s behest, the Zenkos have the job of training the mischievous mutt and turning him into man’s best friend material. / When Ellie's friend Maria is late submitting her painting to the art show, it’s up to the Zenkos to get inside the community center after hours, avoiding overzealous junior security Rodney, and get Maria’s painting on display before the show starts.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go
programme.desc: After Lula loses her loose tooth in the park, Team Zenko must find the missing molar and get it under Lula’s pillow in time for the Tooth Fairy’s visit. / Gabriel and Luis show off their new drone but it crash lands on the roof top. Team Zenko's mission is to try and get it back, but Yolanda won't give up her new hi-tech friend that easily.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Right before basketball tryouts, Peng learns from NaiNai that it is his “big bad” year on the zodiac calendar – which means bad luck. Peng is skeptical at first, but after seeing the positive effects of adhering to NaiNai’s superstitions, he dives headfirst into learning all he can to secure his spot on the team. Eventually, he becomes so consumed that he “breaks up” with Yi and Jin because of their zodiac incompatibility. Cut from tryouts, Peng eventually realizes with the help of his friends that he went overboard and he has more to offer than just basketball.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: A wish-granting toad drops into Yi and the crew’s life just as the dumpling shop is being reviewed by a food magazine writer. Overwhelmed by her efforts to help her mom and NaiNai in the shop, Yi asks the toad to spit up helpful items – but Jin and Peng aren’t so selfless. As a result of granting an abundance of wishes for the whole crew, the toad becomes too weak to continue. Realizing the error of their ways and why the toad appeared in the first place, Yi and Everest use their magic to reverse the toad’s magic onto himself so he can wish himself home.

programme.title: Dinotrux

programme.title: Where's Wally?
programme.desc: When Odlulu challenges the Wanderers to win best chili (and a magic key) at the annual chili cook-off in Hatch, New Mexico, Whitebeard pulls out his old family recipe. The only problem is they don't have the most important ingredient -- a ghost pepper! They need to get a pepper and the key!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Pat must deliver Ben to Greendale School, dressed as superhero, The Blue Flash. But Ben keeps stopping to help people on the way and his costume gets increasingly ruined! Meanwhile at the school, Julian can't wait to meet his hero but Sarah Gilbertson insists that The Blue Flash isn't real... At last Pat arrives at the school with Ben wearing a new costume hastily cobbled together by Pat. Julian isn't fooled. Looks like The Blue Flash isn't real after all... But then Pat tells the kids how Ben helped people on the way and they realise he is a REAL superhero!

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Raa Raa is upset when Topsy suggests that he should stick to doing "Raa Raa" things. He sets out to prove Topsy wrong. Will the noisy little lion learn that sometimes it's best just to be yourself?

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Noddy's new music player starts a craze for the latest dance, the Toy Twist. He decides to have a big dance party that night! All his friends are excited apart from Smartysaurus, who can't dance. When the music player goes missing, Noddy must use all his investigative skills of listening, looking and following clues on the WhoWhatWhere Tablet to find out who has taken the music player and why. Eventually he realises that Smartysaurus borrowed the game so that she could practise the Toy Twist – but it's no good! She still can't master it! Noddy shows her how her own special Dinosaur Dance can make everyone's Toy Twist extra specially fun! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Poppy is having a line dancing party, but none of the other flowertots know how to do it. Will any of them learn to dance in time or will Poppy have to cancel the party?

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Kelp and his underwater friends race around an obstacle course, but Cruz gets sucked into a whirlpool. As each of them try to rescue him, they are sucked in! Kelp saves them all using his unicorn spark to create bubbles he attaches to seaweed. / Kelp helps his unicorn friends create music with their horns and pieces of nature. Ollie is embarrassed by the sound of his horn.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders
programme.desc: The Rescue Riders get stuck in a cave with their rival, Magnus, during a race to find a new source of an important mineral.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: A mysterious figure helps Po escape the guards, so Po makes his way to a desert market, determined to prove Blade wrong for leaving him behind. But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.desc: The annual baby pageant approaches, but Staci’s plan to win may have a negative effect

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: When Baby Corp babies start aging, panic hits the office and the babies set out to find out if someone has been tainting the formula

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai’s stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he’s possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng’s body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Dragons: Defenders of Berk

programme.title: The Slave Hunters
programme.desc: Slaves fervently wishing to live like a human being VS. Slave hunters chasing them tirelessly. A bloody battle between them begins to take place!!! Being a slave hunter, Daegil is disregarded by people due to his low social status. While doing his job, Daegil is offered by Lee Gyongsuk to get Song Taeha and is promised to be given a fair amount of money as a reward. Taeha was forced to become a state slave as he was wrongfully accused of stealing some provisions. After reading a secret message saying the life of Sohyeons youngest son is on the line, Taeha tries to escape in an attempt to save him, the eldest son of the Crown Prince. Daegil, however, gets wind of his plan and the two ends up fighting a bloody fight. Having barely escaped from the fierce fight, Taeha happens to accompany a woman named Hyewon. Daegil fails to track down the slave he was first assigned to capture, and constantly runs into Seolhwa who escaped from a troupe of strolling actors. To make things worse, Daegil is threatened to be killed by a group of slaves who formed a hit squad to assassinate nobles. As for Daegil, he has every reason to be successful in accomplishing his first mission. Aside from recovering his pride hurt by Taeha, Daegil needs a sizable sum of money to live a comfortable life in his old age. In the end, Taeha manages to run away from Daegil while Daegil feels affection for Hyewon.

And that man is Muhak, whom she mistakenly believed to be a big hand in the art world while she was working as a researcher in the Netherlands.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: Grade 3 Science
programme.desc: These episodes discuss about people, animals, plants, landforms and bodies of water, and their importance. These also talk about the types and effects of weather as they relate to daily activities, health and safety, and the natural objects in the sky affect one’s daily activities.

programme.title: Grade 5 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagbibigay ng mga mahalagang pangyayari, paksa, at opinyon tungkol sa napakinggan o nabasang teksto. Matutuhan din dito ang wastong pagbaybay sa mga salita at paglalarawan ng tagpuan at tauhan.

programme.title: Grade 5 Math
programme.desc: These episodes are about area, volume, and temperature. These episodes also explain line graphs and experimental probability.

programme.title: Grade 5 English
programme.desc: These episodes focus on analyzing visual and multimedia elements and writing paragraphs and articles.

programme.title: Grade 5 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ay pag-uusapan ang bahaging ginampanan ng kolonyalismong Espanyol at pandaigdigang koteksto ng reporma sa pag- usbong ng kamalayang pambansa patungo sa pagkabuo ng Pilipinas bilang isang nasyon.

programme.title: Grade 5 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain how weathering and soil erosion shape the Earth’s surface and affect living things and the environment. These episodes also discuss about weather disturbances and their effects, the phases of the Moon and the beliefs and practices, associated with it, and the constellations and the information derived from their location in the sky.

programme.title: Grade 7 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito susuriin ang iba't ibang mga akda ayon sa mga tauhan, kaisipan, at saloobin na nakapaloob dito. Tatalakayin din ang pagsusulat ng sariling pananaw at ideya tungkol sa napakinggan.

programme.title: Grade 7 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach the key concepts, uses, and importance of statistics, data collection/gathering and the different forms of data representation, measures of central tendency, measures of variability, and probability.

programme.title: Grade 7 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach writing and composing essays. These also feature Philippine literature and theater.

programme.title: Grade 7 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagtugon ng mga Asyano sa mga hamon ng pagbabago, pag-unlad at pagpapatuloy ng Silangan at Timog-Silangang Asya sa Transisyonal at Makabagong Panahon (ika-16 hanggang ika-20 Siglo).

programme.title: Grade 7 Science
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the relation of geographical location of the Philippines to its environment, the different phenomena that occur in the atmosphere, the relationship of the seasons and the position of the Sun in the sky, and the occurrence of eclipses.

programme.title: Grade 9 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng iba't ibang akda na may kaugnayan sa kulturang Asyano batay sa mga elemento nito. Ipapaliwanag din dito kung paano maglahad at maghambing ng mga pananaw.

programme.title: Grade 9 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about the basic concepts of trigonometry.

programme.title: Grade 9 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the relevance worth of ideas, soundness of author’s reasoning, and the effectiveness of a presentation. These also explain critical issues that demand sound analysis and call for prompt actions.

programme.title: Grade 9 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa mga sektor ng ekonomiya at mga patakarang pang- ekonomiya nito sa harap ng mga hamon at pwersa tungo sa pambansang pagsulong at pag-unlad.

programme.title: Grade 9 Science
programme.desc: These episodes explain the projectile motion, impulse and momentum, and conservation of linear momentum, conservation of mechanical energy, the relationship among heat, work, and efficiency. These episodes also talk about generation, transmission, and distribution of electrical energy from power plants to home.

programme.title: Extracurricular

programme.title: Alternative Learning System

programme.title: Kindergarten
programme.desc: These episodes teach about the characteristics and needs of animals and plants and how they grow and the physical properties and movement of objects. These also talk about the different types of weather and changes that occur in the environment, the concepts of size, length, weight, time, and money, and the sense of quantity and numeral relations.

programme.title: Grade 1 Filipino
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa pagsusuri ng mga pabula, tugma, tula, balita, at kuwento. Pinakikita rin dito ang tamang paggamit ng malalaki at maliliit na titik, mga pangngalan, at tamang pagbasa ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 1 Math
programme.desc: These episodes discuss time and non-standard units of length, mass and capacity. These episodes also talk about pictographs without scales and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 1 English
programme.desc: These episodes talk about action words and describing words. These episodes also teach about sorting and classifying words and following directions.

programme.title: Grade 1 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito ipapaliwanag ang konsepto ng distansya sa paglalarawan ng sariling kapaligirang ginagalawan tulad ng tahanan at paaralan at ng kahalagahan ng pagpapanatili at pangangalaga nito.

programme.title: Grade 2 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito matutuhan natin ang tungkol sa pagpapantig, pagbibigay ng kahulugan sa mga salita, pagbuo ng mga pangungusap, at pagbabasa ng teksto. Tinatalakay din dito ang mga pang-ukol, pang-abay, at salitang kilos.

programme.title: Grade 2 Math
programme.desc: These episodes talk about time, standard measures of length, mass and capacity and area using square-tile units. These also deepen the understanding about pictographs without and with scales.

programme.title: Grade 2 English
programme.desc: These episodes teach about pronouns and prepositions. These episodes also show how to read, match, and write words that use short vowels.

programme.title: Grade 2 Araling Palipunan
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tatalakayin ang pagpapahalaga sa kagalingang pansibiko bilang pakikibahagi sa mga layunin ng sariling komunidad.

programme.title: Grade 3 Filipino
programme.desc: Sa mga palabas na ito tinatalakay ang tungkol sa mga pangngalan, panghalip, at iba't ibang elemento ng kuwento. Ipapaliwanag din dito ang pagsusulat ng mga kuwento at pagbibigay ng kahulugan ng mga salita.

programme.title: Grade 3 Math
programme.desc: These episodes teach about conversion of time, linear, mass and capacity measures and area of square and rectangle. These episodes also talk about bar graphs and outcomes of an event.

programme.title: Grade 3 English
programme.desc: These epsiodes are about adjectives, adverbs, maps and graphs. These episodes also show how to read words and restate facts from texts.

programme.title: Grade 3 Araling Panlipunan
programme.desc: Ang mga palabas na ito ay tungkol sa gawaing pangkabuhayan at bahaging ginagampanan ng pamahalaan at ang mga kasapi nito, mga pinuno at iba pang naglilingkod tungo sa pagkakaisa, kaayusan at kaunlaran ng mga lalawigan sa kinabibilangang rehiyon.

programme.title: The Birth / The Revelation
programme.desc: Young François witnesses the birth of Barbapapa. // Barbapapa is a prisoner in a zoo.

programme.title: Paddington's Goo Monster / Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure
programme.desc: Paddington makes Goo but can he keep his promise to not make a mess when thngs get out of control? // Paddington and Simi go on a magical journey into the human body to see if an apple pip grows into a tree if you swallow one.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Pig Barn / The Crew Builds A Giant Runway
programme.desc: A new farmer in town asks Rubble & Crew to build a barn for her pig! But will it be done in time for the big Pig Party? // Motor's super special birthday present gets delayed when the pups realize Builder Cove's airport needs a bigger runway.

programme.title: A Guayabera For Tico / Falling Estrella's
programme.desc: Boots gets a Guayabera shirt as a gift for Tico, but becomes attached to it on the way to Tico's house. // Dora, Boots, and Papi want to see the Quetzal constellation dance across the sky, but it loses three stars! Dora has to get them back in time.

programme.title: The Flying Lion
programme.desc: Blaze and AJ are excited to play with their new friend Roarian, the Flying Lion! But when Roarian loses his magical sunstone, he turns into a statue! Now it's up to Blaze and AJ to find the sunstone and restore Roarian's powers!

programme.title: Chili & Cornbread / Layer Cake
programme.desc: Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it. // Chef and Olly set out to make a cake that breaks the record for most layers ever, but quickly realize how hard it is to make a cake that size.

programme.title: Sharknapped!
programme.desc: When Sharkdog doesn't come home from the aquarium, the Sharkpack go on a mission to find their missing friend!

programme.title: Sharkdog Makes a Splash
programme.desc: The Sharkpack must stop Mr. Ceviche before he spills Sharkdog's secret.

programme.title: Fins in the Water
programme.desc: Max is desperate for a dog, but when he finds Sharkdog while paddle boarding he gets a pet - and friend - who is way more bizarre and fun than he expected.

programme.title: Coach Grandma / Busy Baby
programme.desc: Baby Shark's Barnacle Ball team hires an expert coach with unusual methods. // Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: Goldie's Understudies
programme.desc: When Goldie overbooks herself, she trains her friends to be her understudies for the day.

programme.title: Pups Save the Space Alien / Pups Save a Flying Frog
programme.desc: An Alien Spaceship crash lands at Farmer Yumi’s! The PAW Patrol will help out the stranded little extra-terrestrial to get back to his home planet! // Marshall’s new pet frog, Smiley, is going to be in a jumping contest!

programme.title: Pups Save a Sweet Mayor
programme.desc: Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Parking Garage / The Crew Builds A Campsite
programme.desc: The Crew helps with a parking problem when Café Carl's ice cream machine brings lots of cars to Builder Cove. // When Rubble's fear of the dark derails the pup's Bark Yard campout, the Crew comes up with an idea to help him enjoy the starry night.

programme.title: The baby Piggy
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.title: Daddy's Movie Camera
programme.desc: Daddy gets a new video camera. First, Peppa shows him how to work it, and then he records Peppa being silly.

programme.title: School Play
programme.desc: Peppa and her friends take part in a school play about Little Red Riding Hood, but Pedro Pony is nervous to be on the stage.

programme.title: Polly's Holiday
programme.desc: Granny and Grandpa’s pet, Polly Parrot comes to stay. Peppa and George love Polly Parrot. She is very funny and repeats everything anyone says. When Polly flies away, no one knows how to get her back, until George comes up with a very clever plan.

programme.title: Achoo !
programme.desc: Bubu teaches Christopher about allergies. And when he witnesses Anna sneezing uncontrollably when she is around Froga, he is convinced that she is allergic to her! They wonder if they will ever be able to live life as they once did!

programme.title: The Giant Strawberry
programme.desc: When Froga discovers an amazing oversized strawberry in her garden, she quickly becomes obsessed with it. Things come to a head when Froga discovers a bunch more giant strawberries and even Anna is driven away.

programme.title: Chili & Cornbread / Layer Cake
programme.desc: Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it. // Chef and Olly set out to make a cake that breaks the record for most layers ever, but quickly realize how hard it is to make a cake that size.

programme.title: S'Mores
programme.desc: Tiny Chef makes S'Mores for a campout and overcomes his fear of the dark with help from his friends.

programme.title: Truckball Team-Up
programme.desc: Blaze discovers an exciting new sport called Truckball. But when Crusher and his team of cronies challenge him, Blaze must scour all of Axle City to put together a Truckball team before the big game.

programme.title: Big Rig: Dolphin Delivery
programme.desc: When a dolphin named Flippy needs help getting back to his family in the ocean, there's only one monster machine with enough power to get the job done: Big Rig Blaze!

programme.title: Pups Vs. Ouchy Paws / Pups Save a Glow-in-the-Dark Party
programme.desc: Sid Swashbuckle pretends to be a legendary ghost so that he can take Danny's new skateboard. // Ryder and the Pups race to save Mayor Goodway's Glow-in-the-Dark Party guests when a frightened Alien Boy zaps them into floating space bubbles.

programme.title: Pups Stop a Super Shaker / Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse
programme.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire and shakes up Adventure Bay, even threatening to rock the Lookout off its foundation. // Farmer Al has a wild dream that the Paw Patrol must rescue he and Yumi when his animals start acting like humans.

programme.title: Pups and a Whale of a Tale
programme.desc: The pups put a new spin on freeze tag after they fly far north to help free a baby whale that’s trapped under the ice.

programme.title: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak
programme.desc: When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. // There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Playground / The Crew Fixes A Roof
programme.desc: After Speed Meister builds an unsafe playground, the Rubble & Crew get creative and build a whole new one with old materials. // The town Chili Cookaroo is threatened when City Hall's roof starts to cave in! Luckily, the pups know just how to fix it.

programme.title: Troll Jelly / Catch That Kitty
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help the Grumples make troll jelly before the Grumpy Old Troll's snack time. / Dora and Boots have to recover El Gatito Magico and put it in its special place so all the friends stop acting like a cat.

programme.title: Snowball Bonanza / The Present
programme.desc: Chucks tries to help Baby Shark and friends win the annual Snowball Bonanza against Carnivore Cove's neighboring town. // Baby Shark goes undercover to figure out the perfect gift for Mommy Shark.

programme.title: Sharkdoghouse
programme.desc: Max needs to create a permanent home for Sharkdog and he knows that his best friends, Olivia and Royce, are just the people to help him.

programme.title: Sharkdog Digs In
programme.desc: Dad desperately wants to win Garden of the Year but when Sharkdog destroys the garden right before judging, the Sharkpack needs to step in and put it all in order.

programme.title: The Great Shark Hunter
programme.desc: Max needs to find more and more fishsticks to keep Sharkdog fed, but his search leads him right into the path of the increasingly suspicious Captain Barb Quigley.

programme.title: Windy Autumn Day
programme.desc: It is a cold and windy day. At the park, all the leaves have turned red and yellow. It is so windy that Peppa’s ball blows into the pond and George’s hat blows into a tree.

programme.title: Mysteries
programme.desc: The family is watching “Detective Potato” on TV. Peppa and George want to be detectives too. So,Daddy Pig gives them a mystery to solve. Teddy is hidden and Peppa and George use a magnifying glass to follow a trail of cake crumbs to solve the mystery

programme.title: Bubbles
programme.desc: Peppa and George are playing with bubbles. When the bubble mixture runs out, Daddy Pig shows them how to make really big bubbles with an old tennis racket and soapy water. Then he makes a big, muddy, bubbly puddle for everyone to jump up and down in.

programme.title: Bedtime
programme.desc: It’s nearly time for bed and Peppa and George are called in for their bath. After that, they brush their teeth and get into bed. Soon they are fast asleep. Mummy and Daddy Pig finally sit down, but it’s been a long day and they are very sleepy too.

programme.title: Chili & Cornbread / Layer Cake
programme.desc: Chef entrusts Olly with his super-special cornbread pan. But things go terribly wrong when she dents it. // Chef and Olly set out to make a cake that breaks the record for most layers ever, but quickly realize how hard it is to make a cake that size.

programme.title: The Invasion / Prank Day
programme.desc: Barbalala receives a package and discovers little pink animals inside, which she calls the SQUEAKIES. // Barbabravo, Barbalala and Barbabeau are fed up with their brothers and sisters laughing at their expense.

programme.title: Watch Out For Barbabright / If I Were A Billionaire
programme.desc: The twins visit Barbabright's room. // If I were a billionaire, what would I do to achieve my dreams?

programme.title: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Abra-Ka-Pickle!
programme.desc: Pickle is putting on a magic show for all of Axle City! But when Crusher accidentally makes a magical mistake, it's up to Blaze and Pickle to fix the magic and save their friends! Abra-ka-Pickle!

programme.title: Pups Save a Playful Dragon / Pups Save the Critters
programme.desc: Buddy, the playful dragon from one of Alex's books, gets out and the pups need to get him back. // Francois's trailer unhooked, and all of his critters have gotten loose!

programme.title: Pups Save a Sleepover / Pups Save the Carnival
programme.desc: Farmer Al's animals go missing during a sleepover. // Cornelius has escaped from the pig ride at the carnival, and the prizes have gone missing too!

programme.desc: Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.desc: The hamsters think a scout badge has magically turned Greg into a baby bear. // The hamsters meet a local urban legend- DeeDee, "The Library Hamster".

programme.desc: When a hungry Crusher accidentally turns the baker truck’s baker bots to messy mode, they sprout wheels and drive away! It’s up to AJ and Blaze to track down all the rampaging robots before Axle City is blanketed in baked goods.

programme.title: Deep Sea Grand Prix
programme.desc: For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.desc: Mayor Greatway needs her muddy motorcycle cleaned fast! Wheeler and the pups jump into action to build a solution before the big race. // It's Grandpa Gravel's special day! But when the pups are needed, they have to change their Grandpa Day plans.

programme.title: The Crew Builds A Skate Park / The Crew Builds A Tunnel
programme.desc: The Crew has a mishap while building a skatepark. // The Crew helps a pop star get her tour bus to town.

programme.desc: Dora and Boots take care of baby flowers Bouncy Blue, Dizzy Daisy, and Baby Rosette so Isa can attend a royal tea party. / Dora and Boots help baby Andrea find the magical leaf so she can receive her Alebrije powers and take care of the rainforest.

programme.desc: While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter. // Baby sleeps in his parents' bed and loves it so much, he tries to make it a permanent arrangement.

programme.title: Sharks, Sharks, Sharks
programme.desc: Max and Dad are excited to continue their tradition of watching a sharks TV special together, but this year Sharkdog wants to be included.

programme.title: Sharkdog Home Alone
programme.desc: When the Fishers go to the movies, Sharkdog is left home alone for the first time.

programme.title: My Fair Sharkdog
programme.desc: Max and Dennis compete to decide whose 'dog' is the best.

programme.title: Emily Elephant
programme.desc: There's a new pupil at the playgroup, Emily Elephant. Everybody wants to be her friend because she is very good at building blocks and can make a loud noise with her trunk.

programme.title: George's Friend
programme.desc: George and Rebecca Rabbit's little brother Richard each have a toy dinosaur but they are not very good at sharing their toys. Mummy Pig shows them that they can have much more fun at the playground if they play together, just like their big sisters.

programme.title: The Boat Pond
programme.desc: Peppa and her family and friends are playing at the pond with their toy boats. Everyone has a boat to play with except Rebecca Rabbit. Daddy Pig makes Rebecca a boat out of newspaper. Rebecca’s paper boat is so nice; everyone wants one.

programme.title: Mr Scarecrow
programme.desc: The birds keep eating the seeds from Grandpa Pig's flower garden. Peppa and George make a scarecrow, which stops the birds from eating. But Peppa is worried that the birds are hungry, so Granny Pig gives the birdies a birdfeeder with their own seeds.

programme.title: Bean Cake? / Elote
programme.desc: Chef and Olly promise Bonzo they'll make him a lookalike bean cake to celebrate Bean Day, but their lookalike practice cakes get in the way. // Chef and Olly are planning a corn roast, but Ruby gets stuck at the top of a tall corn stalk.

programme.desc: For an important case, a policeman needs the help of his former best friend to impersonate the daughter of a foreign dignitary in a beauty pageant.

programme.title: Wander Bra
programme.desc: An oblivious superhero, passed down her super powers in the form of the “Wander Bra” to an ordinary woman who becomes a supernatural woman every time she wears the magical bra all.

programme.title: Mang Jose
programme.desc: Having the ability of energy absorption and redirection, Mang Jose covertly saves people only if they rent him out. One day, Tope rents Mang Jose to help him save his mother who has been abducted by mysterious troopers of King Ina.

programme.title: Miracle in Cell No. 7
programme.desc: Joselito (Aga Muhlach), an intellectually-disabled man, is wrongfully charged assault and murder. In prison he becomes friends with his fellow inmates and together they form a plan to see his young daughter (Xia Vigor) inside the cell. Years after, his daughter (Bela Padilla) becomes a lawyer and is determined to prove her father's innocence.

programme.title: Bekikang
programme.desc: Bekikang is left and abandoned with a baby boy by friend, Fortunato. He loves and raises the child as his own flesh and blood.

programme.title: Radyo
programme.desc: Ruben (Epy Quizon), who is living a miserable life, is suicidal for not only does he feel rejected by DJ Mila (Rufa Mae Quinto) for not playing his song request, but also by Myla (Katya Santos), an officemate whom he deeply admires but who despises him

programme.title: Gawin Sa Dilim 2
programme.desc: Traumatized by the tragic death of his girlfriend, Jerome drops out of school and retreats to the province where he opens his own inn. Though still broken-hearted, Jerome settles into his new abode and leads a more serene life.

programme.title: Alindog Ni Barbara
programme.desc: Though born twins, Barbara and Elena are worlds apart, Elena is bright and vigorous, while Barbara is mentally retarded. Upon seeing her dear friend's killing, Barbara discovers an unusual and menacing power she possesses: the power to annihiliate with her eyes.

programme.title: Bang Bang Alley
programme.desc: A crime anthology that delves into the culture of violence infecting our society, Bang Bang Alley, features four stories brought to vivid life by musician/writer Ely Buendia, award winning director King Palisoc, and stage actor/director/playwright Yan Yuzon.

programme.title: Beks Days of Our Lives
programme.desc: Richardson (Chad Kinis), Reggie (Lassy Marquez) and Melvin (MC Calaquian) have have been friends for many years despite working in different fields. They decided to go on a vacation, finding themselves in hilarious situations. Everything's going perfectly well until the night Reggie collapses.

programme.desc: The story of the kidnapping of 16-year-old John Paul Getty III and the desperate attempt of his mother to convince his billionaire grandfather to pay the ransom.

programme.title: Made On The Rooftop
programme.desc: High tension summer romance of cool and hip best of friends, HaNeul and Bong-sik, their relationship struggles and personal secrets .

programme.title: The Informer
programme.desc: Because of a failed drug bust, An FBI informant intentionally gets himself incarcerated again in order to infiltrate the mob at a maximum security prison

programme.title: New Fist Of Fury
programme.desc: A fighter helps a woman protect her martial-arts school in World War II Taiwan.

programme.title: The Soul-Mate
programme.desc: A Judo instructor's life turned upside down when he becomes haunted by a ghost of a police officer who is stuck in a coma after an accident while investigating a case

programme.title: Iron Monkey
programme.desc: A martial artist/doctor steals from the corrupt authorities as a masked thief to give to the poor while another martial artist/doctor is forced to hunt him down.

programme.title: Revenger
programme.desc: After waking up and discovering that he has undergone gender reassignment surgery, an assassin seeks to find the doctor responsible.

programme.title: Shark: The Beginning
programme.desc: A victim of school violence who was imprisoned in a boys' prison due to an unexpected incident meets mixed martial arts champion who teaches him how to defend himself against his bully.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: An untested American submarine captain teams with U.S. Navy Seals to rescue the Russian president, who gets kidnap by a rogue general, to avoid an all-out war

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: Based on a true story about the struggles of a police detective to stop a turf war and maintain the peace and order in his district

programme.title: The Changeover
programme.desc: Based on the Carnegie Medal-winning novel by Margeret Mahy, this film follows sixteen-year-old New Zealander Laura, who lives in a low-rent suburb with her mother and four-year-old brother, Jacko. When an ancient spirit attacks Jacko and slowly draws the life out of him, Laura discovers her true identity and the supernatural ability within her, and must harness it to save her brother’s life.

programme.title: No Mercy
programme.desc: A former champion martial artist struggles to find and seeks revenge on those responsible for her sister's disappearance.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Painted Face
programme.desc: Scholar Wang Huai Qing sells paintings to save his ailing wife. He is attacked by a bird demon along the way but is rescued by Fox demon Xiao Rong. To elude the pursuit, Wang brings Xiao Rong home, sparking a love triangle and at the same time, unfolding an impending love between human and demon.

programme.title: Central Park
programme.desc: A group of teenagers hang out for a night of fun in Central Park, but encounters a revenge-seeking killer who plans to kill them off one by one to pay for the sins of one of their fathers.

programme.title: The Nightmares
programme.desc: A young and successful doctor is tortured by recurrent nightmares after a child patient dies accidentally. The line between dreams and reality starts to blur when the faceless killer from these nightmares comes to life and hunts her down.

programme.title: Waning Moon
programme.desc: Nuanchan is a famous and highly respected spiritual medium in a rural village in Thailand. She wants to train her niece, Ploy, to succeed her and Ploy needs to remain a virgin. When Ploy falls in love with her childhood friend Tul, their lives are in danger as the secret of the spiritual world is being unveiled.

programme.title: Whisper of Silent Body
programme.desc: Renowned as the "corpse whisperer," forensic pathologist Qin Ming uncovers vital clues from the corpses. During a homicide investigation, he unravels a murder case sixteen years ago in the snowy mountain with his assistant and a detective. Together, they unveil the secrets of the mysterious homicide.

programme.title: Death of a Girlfriend
programme.desc: When Christine was found brutally murdered in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned to an inquest. Each suspect has his version to tell, but as the investigation progresses, a dark secret is uncovered, which would reveal the real murderer.

programme.title: She is in Danger
programme.desc: After a fight with her boyfriend, Xue leaves home to stay in a remote B&B accommodation, together with a roommate Yi. One night, Xue accidentally discovers that Yi and another friend have killed Yi's ex-boyfriend, and is locked up by the duo so as to cover up the murder. Xue's buddy, Wen, comes seeking for her - can Xue and Wen escape from danger?

programme.title: Beast Mode
programme.desc: A Hollywood director accidentally kills his leading actor and has to find an exact duplicate to proceed with the filming. To do that, he must agree to an evil pact which unleashes a band of bloodthirsty, shape-shifting, ferocious beasts onto L.A…

programme.title: Dead Dicks
programme.desc: Richie is a suicidal young man who finds himself very much alive every time he kills himself, although there will be a dead body of him in his apartment after each suicide attempt. Richie’s sister comes to his rescue and discovers the piled up dead bodies in the house. What keeps bringing Richie back?

programme.title: Tales of the Undeparted
programme.desc: Eight members of the Japanese idol group AKB48 gather at a temple to talk about their most mysterious and terrifying stories. As the group sits in a circle, each member shares a ghost story, urban legend, or paranormal activity found in Japanese folklore. They each holds a lit lantern, and as each story concludes, a lantern extinguishes…

programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: C Dans L'air
programme.desc: All the latest major events, presented, explained and analysed! Special guests and journalists in the studio analyse both the latest news but also other controversial issues to give us a better understanding of the social, political and cultural events occurring around us.

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Pascal and Pierre-Jean are looking to set up home in a lively district of Montreal but the shortage of properties on the market makes their search all the more complicated. Corey and Evelyne still manage to dig up two interesting possibilities, in Vieux-Montreal and in Griffintown.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cédric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: L'albanie, La Nouvelle Perle De La Méditerranée
programme.desc: Albania is one of Europe's most touristic countries. Despite being scarred by years of communism and shortages, the pearl of the Adriatic has today become a leading Mediterranean destination thanks to its idyllic beaches, turquoise waters, majestic landscapes, typical villages, attractive prices...

programme.title: 6H Info
programme.desc: The 6am news bulletin (Paris time) by the France Télévisions editorial team.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Salle Des Profs
programme.desc: A humorous look at working conditions for teachers through the trials and tribulations of five colleagues, unlike any others you've met.

programme.title: Télématin
programme.desc: The latest news and laughter, 7 days a week With Flavie Flament and Julien Arnaud on weekdays, Maya Lauqué and Damien Thévenot at weekends.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Slam
programme.desc: Three contestants compete in a game of arrow crosswords, trying to complete the grids by finding the answers to the definitions provided. But to have access to those definitions, they first need to answer questions that all share one common characteristic: the response is always a letter.

programme.title: Le Téléjournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Une Brique Dans Le Ventre
programme.desc: In addition to the houses, apartments and lofts of various styles and prices which Cédric Wautier shows us through his many visits, this programme about homes offers legal, practical, technical, energy and aesthetic advice, without forgetting the part about the all-important DIY ''tricks''.

programme.title: Quartier Recherché
programme.desc: Pascal and Pierre-Jean are looking to set up home in a lively district of Montreal but the shortage of properties on the market makes their search all the more complicated. Corey and Evelyne still manage to dig up two interesting possibilities, in Vieux-Montreal and in Griffintown.

programme.title: Rocky & Lily : C'Est Dans La Boîte !
programme.desc: Each day, Rocky and Lily receive a new box in the studio. But what's inside? One thing is certain, it's bound to contain a surprise that will lead them to discover a host of very different subjects: from guitars to trolls and even how to sort your waste for recycling!

programme.title: Les Souvenirs De Mamette
programme.desc: Today a friendly 80-year-old grandmother, Mamette was once a headstrong young girl. At the age of nine, she discovered country life with no Internet or mobile phone. A great opportunity for plenty of adventures with her friends, when not taking part in the harvest or rearing goats!

programme.title: Les Super-Pouvoirs Du Vivant
programme.desc: The animal kingdom is brimming with creatures that have extraordinary powers. To reveal the incredible inventiveness of nature and the importance of protecting it, each episode takes us on a fascinating journey rich in poetry and humour.

programme.title: Foot Go
programme.desc: Eight year-old Tata arrives in a new school. She wants to join its football team but isn't allowed to; after all she's a girl! Refusing to be beaten, Tata decides to set up her own girls' team with the help of her gang of friends.

programme.title: Alix Et Les Merveilleux
programme.desc: Alix gives Walrus the idea of opening a restaurant in the land of the Wonderfolk. But the unappetising dishes on the menu aren't to everyone's taste.

programme.title: Le Goût Des Rencontres En Nouvelle-Aquitaine
programme.desc: Exploring rural land and culinary traditions! Chef Justine Piluso criss-crosses Nouvelle-Aquitaine to meet men and women in the region to learn about their products, their tastes and the dishes that they prepare.

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Nous Maigrirons Ensemble
programme.desc: Convinced that his portliness may be one of the reasons for his professional setbacks, Victor Lasnier, a writer and director, decides to go on a diet. He discovers an industry designed to take his money and his extra kilos.

programme.title: À La Poussière
programme.desc: For the last few months, Fazia has begun her days as a cleaner at the Martin-Pelissards', who are reluctant for her work to be legally declared. Then, one morning, an incident turns into a race against time and a desperate attempt to keep her job.

programme.title: Dans Le Noir
programme.desc: After surviving the journey across the Mediterranean, a young Guinean migrant finds refuge in Paris with a Senegalese dandy who makes a living by renting out his ID documents.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: François and Stéphanie go on a double date with Roch and Gisèle. Rollande is finally about to live her greatest dream: a meeting with the author Danielle Cuivre.

programme.title: Discussions Avec Mes Parents
programme.desc: It's the festive season once again. After fifty traditional years in the family home in Saint-Sacrement, François tries to persuade Jean-Pierre to celebrate Christmas Eve in his Montreal flat.

programme.title: Une Autre Histoire
programme.desc: On the same day that Anémone receives her diagnosis of early-onset Alzheimer's she also has to cope with the arrival of a new director at the funeral parlour where she works as an embalmer. Shaken, she has no idea how to announce the illness to friends and family.

programme.title: Éthique Helvétique
programme.desc: What shaped Swiss thought? By analysing the history of the country, Tristan Miquel and Julien Girardin question the ethical and philosophical challenges facing their society and draw up parallels between the past and the present to stimulate reflection on different schools of thought.

programme.title: La Fille D'albino Rodrigue
programme.desc: Rosemay, aged 16, lives with a foster family and only sees her biological family during the holidays. One day, her father doesn't turn up at the train station to collect her. Since he doesn't reappear and her mother gives only evasive replies, the teenager begins to fear the worst...

programme.title: Le Mobilier
programme.desc: A gallery specialising in contemporary art organises a preview presenting a range of different artistic performances. Iliadia, the cleaner, can't understand the point of it and is irritated by the behaviour of certain visitors.

programme.title: Avant-Garde
programme.desc: 1984, the French-German border. A gallery owner from Berlin is carrying with him a flagship sculpture of his collection to present it in a major exhibition. But on seeing the object, the French customs officer is hesitant: is it really an artwork?

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: Le Journal De L'Économie
programme.desc: Three minutes to analyse, understand and explain the latest economic news.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En Français - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'Invité
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'Essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Face Aux Territoires
programme.desc: A key personality from the world of politics, economics, trade unions... answers questions from the regional press on local, national and international current affairs.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Au Fil De L'Eau - La Corse, Un Paradis D'Eau Vive
programme.desc: Anne-Cécile Monnier sets off to explore the ''Island of Beauty's'' fresh water. A veritable plunge into the crystal clear waters of Corsica's sublime rivers: the Fango, the Solenzara, the Asco and the Restonica and the endemic species that live in these little-known ecosystems, notably the Corsican trout (''salmo trutta macrostigma'').

programme.title: Un Si Grand Soleil
programme.desc: The Bastide, Estrela, Salama, Lévy, Berville and Alami families, plus a host of supporting characters, live and work in the modern everyday city of Montpellier, in southern France. Between romance and crime thriller, with a blend of comic and serious themes, their stories weave a fascinating web.

programme.title: L'actu
programme.desc: The televised news programme from TVMonaco.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: The Attorney
programme.desc: When tax attorney Song Woo-Suk agrees to defend a student activist who was arrested and tortured into giving a false confession, his entire life and worldview begin to change drastically.

programme.title: Because I Love You
programme.desc: After an accident, a talented songwriter transforms into a messenger of love by connecting people who having trouble finding love and expressing their feelings.

programme.title: Cart
programme.desc: As a social critique, ‘Cart’ tells a story of the employees of a retail supermarket band together when the contract workers are summarily laid off.

programme.title: Love My Scent
programme.desc: An ordinary man who has never known love, struggles to talk to his crush who goes to work on the same bus as him every day. Things started to change when he acquires a strange perfume that has the power to attract women...

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Two Korean inventors develop a 20-year relationship while advancing the field of astronomy.

programme.title: Cheer Up, Mr. Lee!
programme.desc: Unlike his heart-throb appearances, Mr. Lee, who has very child-like characteristics, embarks on a voyage of discovery with his young daughter ‘Saet-byeol’ whom he has just met.

programme.title: The Negotiation
programme.desc: An arms dealer kidnapped two Koreans in Bangkok where the hostages were in fact held in an abandoned children's home in South Korea, when the kidnapper's motivations becomes clearer.

programme.title: The Con Artists
programme.desc: A wily safecracker is forced to help a mob boss pull off a $150 million heist, but smells a double-cross in the works.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep1
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: Mr. Queen Ep2
programme.desc: After an accident, Jang Bong-hwan finds himself transported back in time to the Joseon dynasty, trapped in the body of Queen Cheo-rin, wife to King Cheol-jong, the reigning monarch of that period.

programme.title: The Whispering
programme.desc: A woman and her boyfriend are among a group of students who are on a trip to celebrate their graduation. They wander into an abandoned amusement park and discover the "House of Horrors".

programme.title: Parasite
programme.desc: An unstoppable string of mishaps awaits when greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

programme.title: The King
programme.desc: Believing power is paramount, Tae-soo aspires to become a prosecutor. As he achieves his goal and rises swiftly to power, he also sees the cruelty of a life at the top hierarchy in 90's Korea.

programme.title: Express Delivery: Mongolia Edition
programme.desc: “Let’s deliver parcels while riding horses!” The “Dragon Zodiac Club” members become delivery men in Mongolia, globe-trotting to deliver parcels from the world only to keep their word!

programme.title: Good Day
programme.desc: As a project proposed by G-DRAGON himself, the highly anticipated variety show <Good Day> presents the process of producer G-DRAGON collaborating with different artists to create the song of the year.

programme.title: Heo's Diner
programme.desc: Based on a web novel of the same name, a man from Joseon dynasty accidentally travels 400 years into the future and opens a restaurant unintentionally in modern Seoul.

programme.title: The Legend of the Blue Sea
programme.desc: A mermaid from the Joseon period ends up in present-day Seoul, where she crosses paths with a swindler who may have ties to someone from her past.

programme.title: The Genius Paik

programme.title: Handsome Guys

programme.title: Paano Ba Ang Magmahal?
programme.desc: Jun (Niño Muhlach) feels neglected as his parents do not have time for him. He leaves home and ends up staying with Dodie (Aga Muhlach). With Dodie, Jun finds the attention and love he wants. But all ends well as it turns out that Dodie's girlfriend is Millet (Pops Fernandez) who also happens to be the niece of Josie's colleague, Ramon (Dante Rivero).

programme.title: Kamandag ng Kris
programme.desc: A Muslim school teacher and a Christian military general agree to hold talks. But what should have been a step towards peace became a source of added discord when the general is killed in a massacre and the teacher's son is slain in the counter-offensive.

programme.title: Ang Pagbabalik ni Pedro Penduko (Digitally Enhanced)
programme.desc: Pedro Penduko (Janno Gibbs) who was decreed by a hermit as the savior of the world, which was under an evil curse. To fulfill his destiny, he had to go back in time and fight with the malevolent pair from hell, Lucifero and Lucifera.

programme.title: She-Man, Mistress of the Universe
programme.desc: Joey de Leon played the role of Pando, a kind-hearted country bumpkin with illusions of being a superhero. His fantasy came true when he was given powers by Gayskull to enable him to rescue the barrio kids who had been kidnapped by the men of Skeleton.

programme.title: Laglag Barya Gang
programme.desc: Ike Lozada has been given the task to nurture and shelter homeless children. Unable to make ends meet, he taught his children to become street hustlers.

programme.title: Tootsie Wootsie (Ang Bandang Walang Atrasan)
programme.desc: Tom, Dick and Harry were falsely accused of killing a popular radio commentator and their girlfriends, Amy, Susie and Tessie were helping them prove their innocence.

programme.title: Tong-Its
programme.desc: Two popular figures in the local music scene, pop singer, Janno Gibbs and master rapper, Francis Magalona teamed up in this comedy about two cops who enjoyed playing a game Tong-its, a popular type of card game.

programme.title: Roberta
programme.desc: Child actress Mumay Santiago gets her biggest break as she portrayed the title role in this remake of the Sampaguita Pictures' classic from the 50's. Roberta is a little girl forced to learn how to fend for herself because of her abusive and irresponsible father and ailing mother. When her mother died, Roberta is forced to live on the streets of the city where despite her many hardships, she managed to maintain a sunny disposition that enchants even strangers.

programme.title: Bangkay Mo Akong Hahakbangan
programme.desc: Join the King of Stunts, Dante Varona, on this deadly game on hide and seek and of vengeance and justice.

programme.title: Do Re Mi
programme.desc: Donna, Regine and Mikee had one thing in common. They were all dreaming of success as singing stars. Duped by an illegal job recruiter, who promised them a stint in Japan, they decided to strike out on their own by putting up a restaurant where they could also perform.

programme.title: Kumusta Ka Hudas
programme.desc: Mario (Rudy Fernandez) and Fidel (Ace Vergel) are best of friends since childhood. But some dissidents set-up Mario and Fidel to look like they betrayed each other. Can the two friends find it in their heart to trust each other again?

programme.title: Urban Rangers
programme.desc: Urban warfare could be as dangerous as being in a battle zone. This was discovered by a group of young idealistic new graduates from the police academy who were unjustly sent to prison because they refused to condone the corruption in the force.

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S2 10
programme.desc: Murtaugh's family Christmas vacation in Hawaii is put on hold while he and Riggs investigate the death of an old friend; Riggs gets a surprise call from a relative.

programme.title: Superman & Lois S4 6
programme.desc: Luthor plans to move LuthorCorp to Smallville, but finds opposition in Lana. Sarah faces a difficult decision, and Clark confronts Luthor face-to-face.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 15
programme.desc: At an appliance store, a man goes bananas over Michael's self-stocking fridge. Then, Michael speeds up the life cycle of a frog in a science lab, and he pulls the strings at an estate sale when a haunted doll toys with his assistant.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S4 16
programme.desc: At a deli, Michael bakes bread with power tools, and in a tux store, his outfit change doesn't suit his customer. Plus, at the stadium for the Chicago White Sox, Michael swings for the fences with a fiery trick that stuns his helper.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 5
programme.desc: With the future of their companies hanging in the balance, Mark and his business partners tackle tough decisions. Later, Mark's new business advisor challenges a potential future endeavor.

programme.title: Wahl Street S1 6
programme.desc: After launching his latest business and returning to set, Mark reflects on the unprecedented year and contemplates his future priorities.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 18
programme.desc: On the hottest day of the year, will the sun cause the bidders to make crazy decisions? In the sweltering heat, the bidders must fight for the ultimate blind buy - a unit completely hidden behind a sheet of plastic!

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S1 8
programme.desc: Four friends compete to embarrass each other in the ultimate hidden camera showdown. The guys conduct a focus group with unique consumer questioning, are totally unfit as trainers in a gym class, and pretend to work at a famous New York bakery.
